Wheelie glanced, listening, "Well, then tell me what you do, if=
 you can say who made you too?"  Listening softly, "Who made you all the wa=
y out here?  Without anyone else knowing the cheer?"

This sounded very pec=
uliar to him, as he knew that even with the Maximals focused on the Predaco=
ns, they were hardly going to have missed a large facility wtih a large gro=
uping of units within it.

Much less where all of thier equipment and weapo=
ns had come from. W hile Wheelie had seen many 'escaped and abandoned' colo=
nies, they were not remotely as well equipped as this place was.

Poitning at the symbol, "What was his name, and where from did he came?"  W=
alking along then, not sitting, "And thank you, but I must know..  Where wa=
